import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { FiClock, FiUsers, FiHeart, FiArrowLeft, FiPlus, FiCheckCircle, } from "react-icons/fi" import "./RecipeDetails.css" const RecipeDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() const navigate = useNavigate() const [recipe, setRecipe] = useState(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [isFavorite, setIsFavorite] = useState(false) const [servings, setServings] = useState(1) // Sample recipe data (in real app, this would come from API) const sampleRecipe = { id: 1, title: "Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl", description: "A nutritious bowl packed with quinoa, fresh vegetables, and Mediterranean flavors. This recipe is perfect for a healthy lunch or dinner and provides all the essential nutrients your body needs.", image: "ü•ó", calories: 320, cookingTime: 25, prepTime: 15, servings: 2, category: "lunch", tags: ["vegetarian", "high-protein", "mediterranean", "gluten-free"], difficulty: "Easy", rating: 4.8, reviews: 156, ingredients: [ { name: "Quinoa", amount: "1 cup", category: "grains" }, { name: "Cherry tomatoes", amount: "1 cup", category: "vegetables" }, { name: "Cucumber", amount: "1 medium", category: "vegetables" }, { name: "Red onion", amount: "1/4 cup", category: "vegetables" }, { name: "Kalamata olives", amount: "1/4 cup", category: "pantry" }, { name: "Feta cheese", amount: "1/4 cup", category: "dairy" }, { name: "Extra virgin olive oil", amount: "2 tbsp", category: "pantry" }, { name: "Lemon juice", amount: "2 tbsp", category: "pantry" }, { name: "Fresh parsley", amount: "1/4 cup", category: "herbs" }, { name: "Salt and pepper", amount: "to taste", category: "pantry" }, ], instructions: [ "Rinse quinoa in cold water until water runs clear. In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to boil.", "Add quinoa, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until water is absorbed.", "Remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork and let cool completely.", "Meanwhile, dice the cucumber and red onion. Halve the cherry tomatoes.", "In a large bowl, combine cooled quinoa, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and olives.", "In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.", "Pour dressing over quinoa mixture and toss to combine.", "Top with crumbled feta cheese and fresh parsley before serving.", "Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 3 days.", ], nutrition: { calories: 320, protein: 12, carbs: 45, fat: 14, fiber: 6, sugar: 8, sodium: 380, }, tips: [ "For best flavor, let the salad sit for 30 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld.", "This recipe keeps well in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.", "You can substitute the feta cheese with goat cheese or omit for a vegan version.", "Add grilled chicken or chickpeas for extra protein.", ], } useEffect(() => { // Simulate API call const fetchRecipe = async () => { try { setLoading(true) // In a real app, you would make an API call here // const response = await axios.get(`/api/recipes/${id}`); // setRecipe(response.data); // For demo purposes, use sample data setTimeout(() => { setRecipe(sampleRecipe) setServings(sampleRecipe.servings) setLoading(false) }, 1000) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching recipe:", error) setLoading(false) } } fetchRecipe() }, [id]) const handleFavoriteToggle = () => { setIsFavorite(!isFavorite) // In a real app, you would make an API call to save/remove favorite } const handleServingsChange = (newServings) => { if (newServings > 0) { setServings(newServings) } } const getAdjustedAmount = (originalAmount, originalServings) => { const multiplier = servings / originalServings const match = originalAmount.match(/^(\d+(?:\.\d+)?)\s*(.*)$/) if (match) { const amount = parseFloat(match[1]) const unit = match[2] const adjustedAmount = (amount * multiplier) .toFixed(2) .replace(/\.?0+$/, "") return `${adjustedAmount} ${unit}` } return originalAmount } if (loading) { return (

Loading recipe...

) } if (!recipe) { return (

Recipe not found

) } return (
{/* Header */}
{recipe.image}
{recipe.tags.map((tag) => ( {tag} ))}

{recipe.title}

{recipe.description}

{recipe.cookingTime} min
{recipe.servings} servings
{recipe.calories} cal
‚≠ê {recipe.rating} ({recipe.reviews} reviews)
{/* Nutrition Info */}

Nutrition Facts

{Math.round( (recipe.nutrition.calories * servings) / recipe.servings )} Calories
{Math.round( (recipe.nutrition.protein * servings) / recipe.servings )} g Protein
{Math.round( (recipe.nutrition.carbs * servings) / recipe.servings )} g Carbs
{Math.round( (recipe.nutrition.fat * servings) / recipe.servings )} g Fat
{Math.round( (recipe.nutrition.fiber * servings) / recipe.servings )} g Fiber
{Math.round( (recipe.nutrition.sodium * servings) / recipe.servings )} mg Sodium
{/* Ingredients */}

Ingredients

Servings: {servings}
{recipe.ingredients.map((ingredient, index) => (
))}
{/* Instructions */}

Instructions

{recipe.instructions.map((instruction, index) => (
{index + 1}
{instruction}
))}
{/* Tips */}

Chef's Tips

{recipe.tips.map((tip, index) => (

{tip}

))}
) } export default RecipeDetails
